messages.title: The CONSERVATIVES will CUT DEEPER and FASTER...
messages.content: The Conservatives will keep cutting even after the books have been balanced. Their plans are for cuts far beyond what is needed, will put local schools, police and other services under threat.

messages.title: It’s the Lib Dems or Conservatives here
messages.content: Only the Liberal Democrats will balance the books AND protect vital services

messages.title: ...AND LOCAL SCHOOLS, THE NAVY, POLICE AND HEALTH SERVICES WILL PAY THE PRICE
messages.content: Tory cuts will take us back to the Great Depression, warn financial ‘experts’

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Balancing the budget by 2018, to bring down Britain’s debt. The Liberal Democrats are committed to finishing the job of balancing the books by 2015 and bringing down Britain’s debt and backing small business and job creation.
£8 billion extra for the NHS every year by 2020.
Protecting education spending from cradle to college.

issues.education: Protecting education spending from cradle to college.
issues.health: £8 billion extra for the NHS every year by 2020.

endorsements.endorsement: Osborne’s moves to cut spending to 1930s levels
‘Tory cuts will take us back to the Great Depression, warn senior Tory’
‘Cameron WILL have to cut beyond the bones, warns senior Tory’

quotes.text: The Liberal Democrats are committed to finishing the job of balancing the books by 2015 and bringing down Britain’s debt and backing small businesses and job creation.

images.caption: Depiction of contrasting viewpoints between Liberal Democrats and Conservatives.
